description: The Studding Twins are just returning from an afternoon on the lake, kayaking and swimming.  Dave and Matt had an especially good time meeting a group of hot young ladies who were enjoying the cool water as well.They made plans to meet up with the girls later and are very excited because the twins know it'll be an opportunity to tag team multiple girls and get their dicks wet.  However they don't want the girls to think they're immature.  Just to be safe, the guys decide to stroke their eager cocks now so they last longer with the sweet babes later.  These guys are geniuses!  Enjoy!
title: David & Matt Studding
